articles.author: Rhea Mogul, Sophia Saifi
articles.title: A tourist massacre in Kashmir is escalating tensions between India and Pakistan. Here’s what we know - CNN
articles.description: Relations between India and Pakistan are cratering following a deadly attack in the disputed Himalayan region of Jammu and Kashmir that left more than two dozen tourists dead.
articles.content:
Relations between India and Pakistan are cratering following a deadly attack in the disputed Himalayan region of Jammu and Kashmir that left more than two dozen tourists dead.
